Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Crupti> Are there any rewards for staking my mined coins?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jonske1> What block will the reward be halving?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Crupti> @jimboscott Found an explaination in the whitepaper I think: "When a staker performs the test for eligibility and discovers a winning UTXO for a block, they can add that UTXO as a no-fee spend to themselves to the end of that block, validate the block in all other respects, and submit that block to the Verus network, along with the coinbase transaction, which pays new coins to the same address of the staking transaction at the end of the block."
